rawls.classes.renderer¶

Classes

Renderer(resolution, samples, sampler, …) Rawls renderer information
class rawls.classes.renderer.Renderer(resolution, samples, sampler, integrator, camera, lookAt)[source]¶

Rawls renderer information

resolution¶

{Resolution} – x and y resolution of image

sampler¶

{Sampler} – sampler instance with information

integrator¶

{Integrator} – integrator instance with information

camera¶

{Camera} – camera instance with information

lookAt¶

{LookAt} – look at instance with eye, point and up vector

classmethod fromcomments(comments)[source]¶

Instanciate Renderer object with all comments information

Parameters:comments – {str} – extracted comments data
Returns:{Renderer} – renderer information instance
